page.syntax: L RevokeAccess(Name as C, AccessType as C [, Resource as C])
page.description: Revoke from a user or group the access specified, optionally, on the resource named.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::RevokeAccess() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .RevokeAccess( Name as C, AccessType as C [, Resource as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. NameThe name of a user or group. ResourceThe name of a resource AccessTypeOptional. The type of access to grant.
Description The RevokeAccess() method revokes access to a resource from a user or group. Limitations See Also SQL::Connection Object
